comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Here's something cool--the copy of Gruenberg's book Sons and Daughters (1916) that was scanned for Googlebooks includes a handwritten dedication from Sidonie Gruenberg to Birdie Gans: books.google.com/books?id=FVYXAAAAYAAJ&ots=WbxP-wE3MN...

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Hi Penny- Wow! Very cool and so serendipitous! I love it (and for the rest of you, here's the inscription transcribed): "To Birdie Gans In grateful acknowledgement of her inspiration and guidance in the work of the Federation for Child Study, which has meant so much to the author--and, she hopes, to her sons and daughter. Sidonie Matsner Gruenberg New York May 1916." What a wonderful find. Best, Catherine Shteynberg Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02] Hi Penny- I just wanted to let you know that we profiled some of your Woemen's History Month research on the Archives' BIGGER PICTURE blog: blog.photography.si.edu/2011/04/07/womens-history-month-s... Thank you again! Best, Catherine Shteynberg Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02]  Yay!  So happy to hear you received the print safe and sound. I will definitely let Catherine and Effie and Sarah Stauderman (who constructed the lovely archival matting!) know that the print has arrived. 

Thank you for your continued interest, sharing your wisdom and inspired craftiness. 

By the way, cute hat!  ;) 

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  I made the hat, but now I see I never photographed it to post on Flickr and Ravelry.  Must remedy that...  Yes, good strong matte, very well packaged, arrived in excellent condition.

comment.author: 61546279@N00
comment._content: Sidonie Matsner Gruenberg is my maternal great-grandmother and I have some scanned photos online here:http://www.flickr.com/photos/fuego/2451324446/in/set-72157594540031444/. The internet keeps turning up more goodies every time I check.
